I was very sceptical about buying this game; I watched people play it and the premise of the game seemed dull to me. But after so many recommendations from friends I eventually caved in and i have to say i am pleasantly surprised. 

While it isn't perfect I have thoroughly enjoyed playing thus far and there's room for a lot of variety with the different killers and survivors alike with unique abilities. I'll update this review once i've played for longer but for a game to keep me invested for 75 hours in a single week i have to give it credit and now i feel like exploring some of the many DLC survivor/killers available!
This game is dope
Got impaled with a cucumber by the killer when i started to play, now, i still get impaled but with experience.

I enjoy this game every time i play it. It is the most beautiful bug-free game on the steam store ever! Point of the game is to run away from the killer and survive, or just kill all the survivors. Please give mi award points. Thanks <3
otimo jogo e os bugs s√£o os melhores

Dead by Daylight is a fun, scary and strategic game with a closely knitted community of players.

Pros:
-Simple Gameplay 
-Very simple but interesting lore
-Easy to understand perks and abilities
-Fast Pace
-Lots of new characters and events
-Cool Maps and map mechanics
-Fun with Friends
-Collectible cosmetics from the rift

Con:
-Rarely but can be buggy

Lo compre hoy porque estaba en oferta, ya de entrada me encontre con varios bugs y todavia no puedo jugar. Primero se crasheaba despues de la cinematica de silent hill. Despues me decia "steam desconectado", y ahora se crashea cuando llego a la ventana del juego para elejir los modos, opciones, etc. Llevo buscando unas horas en google y no encuentra una solucion, pero si mucha gente con estos problemas...

This is a really fun game to play with your friends.  My solo play experience has been limited, but with buddies its really fun.  Some of the hunters are really annoying to deal with, and sometimes I feel like the matchmaking doesn't take things like character levels and profile rank into account because I've been hunting on a fresh hunter at the begining of my game and run up on really high rank/level people.

If you get salty for losing easily, I wouldn't reccomend it though.

O jogo √© no estilo competitivo 4vs1. Voc√™ pode iniciar como sobrevivente ou como assassino, cada personagem tem suas vantagens e as mesmas podem ser ensinadas para outros personagens ao chegar em um certo n√≠vel no seu personagem.
De sobrevivente, a sua miss√£o √© fazer 5 geradores com outras 3 pessoas e escapar pelos port√µes de sa√≠das ou pela escotilha, no mapa h√° barricadas e janelas que podem ser usadas para voc√™ escapar do assassino.
De assassino, sua miss√£o √© fazer o m√°ximo de sacrif√≠cios nos ganchos, ou seja, matar at√© 4 sobreviventes para satisfazer a entidade, o assassino pode ir atras dos sobreviventes e enganch√°-los nos ganchos pr√≥ximos (que s√£o mostrados enquanto voc√™ carrega algu√©m), cada assassino tem seu poder e diferente dos sobreviventes, esse poder n√£o pode ser ensinado para outros personagens. O seu objetivo √© impedir os sobreviventes de fazer os 5 geradores e escaparem.

√â um jogo excelente, mesmo contendo bugs e erros (que √© normal em todo jogo), voc√™ pode se entreter muito com ele. Tendo 3 modos de jogos que s√£o: SWF (Sobreviv√™ncia com seus amigos ou jogar sozinho de sobrevivente), KYF (√© o modo customizado, nele √© tudo liberado e n√£o √© rankeado) e de Killer (onde voc√™ pode jogar como assassino).
Quando voc√™ √© iniciante no jogo, ele te d√° o rank 20, que √© sua classifica√ß√£o, quanto mais voc√™ jogar, mais pontos (bips) ganhar√° e com isso seu rank diminuir√°, chegando ao m√°ximo de 1. (Isso serve tanto para sobrevivente quanto para assassino).

Recomendo esse jogo, al√©m de ser viciante, muitos que n√£o gostavam e jogaram, acabaram gostando. Ele est√° em constante promo√ß√µes, eventos e atualiza√ß√µes. √â isso, obrigado pra quem leu tudo kkkk.
Jogo muito bacana! Vale a pena. rsrsrs

Fun game very addicting, but there are some huge flaws that brings the game way down, The hitboxes for the killers are horrible they are way too inconsistent in most cases, Matchmaking is next It takes about a minute to load in as survivor BUT somehow the killer matchmaking takes 30 minutes and It is INSANITY!

These flaws are HUGE issues that need to be fixed.

BUT if you can look past these 2 issues then this is a very fun game with and without friends so human slugs like me and actual humans can enjoy this.
It will ruin your life.

Dieses Spiel bietet eine sehr schlechte Spiel Qualit√§t, etliche (riesen)Bugs (wie z.B. durch W√§nde blicken etc.), Toxic Community, Facecamping/Tunnelling. Bis heute bin ich nicht √ºberzeugt, dass die Entwickler je was aus dem Spiel machen wollen. Es geht ja meist nur um Profit.

Im gesamten bietet dieses Spiel nur schlechtes worauf man sich nicht freuen wird, deshalb empfehle ich keinen dieses Spiel weiter!

This game is very fun to play when you have nothing to do. And it's most fun when you have someone to play with, for example I've played this game since 2017 and it's still fun. I've driven around seven hundred hours myself and the rest with friends. And I recomend this game to anyone who has time.
literally one of the worst games ever created by man, so glad i stopped playing. i recommend you avoid it entirely.

Great game if you wanna slowly lose your sanity. If you're a horror fan you will definitely like this game, but beware of the toxicity and prepare yourself to rage. There is still a lot of room for improvement but it's an enjoyable game, and one of the few games that got me addicted after a long time. Sadly, they've been ruining the game recently, and we there hasn't been good new survivors and killers, but if you are brand new to the game and have friends to play with it's a good choice.
so very good! very good game reccpmend game to everyone!

I didn't spend money on this game for them to go support NFTs...

Boons are broken, some killers need serious rework (I mean Sadako... really? she has absolutely no chase power.... I'd rank her with Pig at the lowest tier).
And I'm telling you this as a surv main.

Apart from that it's a really nice game. Yes, there are lots of issues and yes, the devs don't always seem to get their own game which is reflected in some very bad decisions but it's really fun to master it. Prepare for investing a few hundred or thousand hours play time if you really want to be good at it (I'm still shit btw). So I recommend it to anyone searching for a new main game which is a bit more complex than it looks. Just give it a try.
